snippet: The addition of the free agent Curtis Granderson does not hide the question marks the team faces. “I think we’re still building,” said Jeff Wilpon, the team’s chief operating officer.
lead_paragraph: The addition of the free agent Curtis Granderson does not hide the question marks the team faces. “I think we’re still building,” said Jeff Wilpon, the team’s chief operating officer.

headline.main: Wilpon Says Mets Have ‘a Long Way to Go’
headline.print_headline: Jeff Wilpon Says Mets Have ‘a Long Way to Go’
